Runes

Runes need to be created with magic empowered materials, typically with a special magical ink. Once drawn a rune can be turned on and off by spending 1 Intellect and succeeding on a L2 Intellect Task.

Venatori Known Runes

Contain Magic

This rune contains magic, the Venatori tattoo this on all newborn children before they are given back to the mothers in order to keep their innate abilities in check until they can begin training. Typically this rune is placed on a shoulder or the back unseen by the world.

Has no game mechanic

Fearless Heart

When a young Venatori is of age to join the Academy in their region they are given the Fearless Heart rune as a tattoo over their heart. This allows a young Venatori to go fearlessly into battle with a supernatural creature.

When active this rune grants an asset to initiative.

Mind Shield

Mind Shield runes are given to all Venatori children when they are young. Between the ages of birth and four. This rune keeps a child safe from mental intrusions by others. If a child is telepathic or has other mind altering abilities at birth, the child has it nearly immediately to save the parents from infantile manipulation and unaltering changes the child can make. The mind shield rune is typically tattooed on the back between the shoulder blades along the spine.

When active this rune grants an asset to intellect defense tasks

Perception

The Perception rune allows a Venatori to see into the occult with ease. This enhances their ability to do so already. They are given the rune when they turn ten typically and begin learning about the occult. Typically it is placed in the middle of their chest on their sternum.

When active this rune grants an asset to seeing through to the occult.

Stealth

aka The Cross Swords

The Stealth rune is what the supernatural world refers to as the Venatori Cross Swords. It indicates a fully trained and deadly Venatori. The rune allows the Venatori to go nearly unnoticed by mundanes and tells the supernatural world they are Venatori. This rune is placed on the right temple.

When active this rune grants an asset to remaining hidden in the mundane world.

TARDIS Rune

This rune is applied to containers and can change the shape and size of the inside, typically making the space larger. The Venatori specifically attuned runes on ancient materials attached to doors to create endless rooms and housing for their buildings in mundane areas.

When activated the user can specify the size and shape of the container. Once activated the container is the same after each activation.

Sussuri Known Runes

Disable Magic

This run when bound to a container will disable the use of all magic with in the confines of the container.

The container can be a simple ring of Moonlit Ash, or the walls of a room. All walls, ceiling and floor must be runed in order for such a container to be formed.

Prophylactic

Sussuri have the means of protecting themselves and their partner from both unwanted pregnancies and STDs. Typically the rune is tattooed delicately on the inside of either hip bone but can be applied anywhere that is easily deactivated when a pregnancy is wanted.
